array.hpp

00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_ARRAY_HPP

00008 
00009 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00010 #include <boost/serialization/split_member.hpp>
00011 #include <boost/serialization/wrapper.hpp>
00012 #include <boost/mpl/always.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_const.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/array.hpp>
00017 #include <iostream>
00018 
00019 #include <cstddef> // std::size_t
00020 #include <cstddef>
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp> // msvc 6.0 needs this for warning suppression
00022 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00023 namespace std{ 
00024     using ::size_t; 
00025 } // namespace std
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 namespace boost { namespace serialization {
00029 
00030 // traits to specify whether to use  an optimized array serialization
00031 
00032 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
00033 // workaround for Borland compiler
00034 template <class Archive>
00035 struct use_array_optimization {
00036   template <class T> struct apply : boost::mpl::false_ {};
00037 };
00038 
00039 #else
00040 template <class Archive>
00041 struct use_array_optimization : boost::mpl::always<boost::mpl::false_> {};
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 template<class T>
00045 class array
00046  : public wrapper_traits<array<T> >
00047 {
00048 public:    
00049     typedef T value_type;
00050     
00051     array(value_type* t, std::size_t s) :
00052         m_t(t),
00053         m_element_count(s)
00054     {}
00055     
00056     // default implementation
00057     template<class Archive>
00058     void serialize_optimized(Archive &ar, const unsigned int, mpl::false_ ) const
00059     {
00060       // default implemention does the loop
00061       std::size_t c = count();
00062       value_type * t = address();
00063       while(0 < c--)
00064             ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", *t++);
00065     }
00066 
00067     // optimized implementation
00068     template<class Archive>
00069     void serialize_optimized(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version, mpl::true_ )
00070     {
00071       boost::serialization::split_member(ar, *this, version);
00072     }
00073 
00074     // default implementation
00075     template<class Archive>
00076     void save(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version) const
00077     {
00078       ar.save_array(*this,version);
00079     }
00080 
00081     // default implementation
00082     template<class Archive>
00083     void load(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version)
00084     {
00085       ar.load_array(*this,version);
00086     }
00087     
00088     // default implementation
00089     template<class Archive>
00090     void serialize(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version)
00091     {
00092       typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME 
00093           boost::serialization::use_array_optimization<Archive>::template apply<
00094                     BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME remove_const<T>::type 
00095                 >::type use_optimized;
00096       serialize_optimized(ar,version,use_optimized());
00097     }
00098     
00099     value_type* address() const
00100     {
00101       return m_t;
00102     }
00103 
00104     std::size_t count() const
00105     {
00106       return m_element_count;
00107     }
00108     
00109 private:
00110     value_type* m_t;
00111     std::size_t const m_element_count;
00112 };
00113 
00114 template<class T>
00115 inline
00116 #ifndef BOOST_NO_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ORDERING
00117 const
00118 #endif
00119 array<T> make_array( T* t, std::size_t s){
00120     return array<T>(t, s);
00121 }
00122 
00123 template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t N>
00124 void serialize(Archive& ar, boost::array<T,N>& a, const unsigned int /* version */)
00125 {
00126   ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("elems",a.elems);
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 
00131 } } // end namespace boost::serialization
00132 
00133 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
00134 // ignore optimizations for Borland
00135 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_USE_ARRAY_OPTIMIZATION(Archive)      
00136 #else
00137 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_USE_ARRAY_OPTIMIZATION(Archive)           \
00138 namespace boost { namespace serialization {                           \
00139 template <> struct use_array_optimization<Archive> {                  \
00140   template <class ValueType>                                          \
00141   struct apply : boost::mpl::apply1<Archive::use_array_optimization   \
00142       , BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::remove_const<ValueType>::type   \
00143     >::type {};                                                       \
00144 }; }}
00145 #endif // __BORLANDC__
00146 
00147 #endif //BOOST_SERIALIZATION_ARRAY_HPP
